posts.post_content:
Hello,

For sale, I have three Obaks from 1910 and 1911. Here are the players:

1910 Obaks: 
Spider Baum: Nice card! Possibly trimmed at top.  $35 postpaid SOLD
Streib: Creases, paper loss on back. $20 postpaid   SOLD

1911 Obaks:
Metzger: Creases, bright colors!  $40 postpaid SOLD


Please message me on Net54 with any questions or offers.

Thanks!
Peter Baldes
